caption.p: (A) Principal components analysis (PCA) of phyla abundance from bacterial communities in Fine Shale (FS) and Retorted Shale (RS) by-products. STAMP comparisons of metagenomes: (B) the blue dot represents Fine Shale (FSI collected in 2008), and the orange represent FSII samples collected in 2011. (C) The orange dot represents Retorted Shale (RSII/2011), and the blue represent RSI/2008 samples.
